channel.title: Mac loading help
channel.description:
I ran my 317 server on my mac but its not loading the files and what not..
[code]npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. [/code]
Does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Mac loading help
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

pwned my mom:

As the code says, the CFG files are missing…? Are they even in the folder?

They are… if you read the topic I am using a mac so reading the files are differently and it won’t do it correctly
I have to edit a line of code in client.java but I’m not sure which one so I posted this topic

Read full topic

item.title: Mac loading help
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

[quote=“chocothunda, post:2, topic:337507”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,431427.0.html

I’m not sure if that is what you are asking for, but that is to run a client. I do not think it is possible to run a server on a Mac though.

Good Luck ;). [/quote]
That is how to run a client bro,not a server

Read full topic
